title: Spathari (quarry)
description: A limestone quarry located just south of the modern Acarnanian village of Lepenou with clear evidence of having been used as a source for the construction of the temple of Zeus and other monuments at nearby ancient Stratos.

properties.description: Location after Funke 2001, page 196, figure 6. Dates from Zeus temple, see Funke page 192.
properties.title: Imagery location of quarry centerpoint
